story.title: The Last Letter
story.author: Elena Rousseau
story.description: When you discover a mysterious love letter in your late grandmother

nodes.title: Family Secrets
nodes.narration: Your aunt goes pale when you mention the letter. She pours tea with shaking hands and admits that your grandmother spent a year in Paris before meeting your grandfather. She came home suddenly, never explained why, and forbade anyone from mentioning it. Your aunt produces a small photograph: your grandmother at 23, radiant in a sundress, standing next to a young man whose face is turned away.

choices.text: Take the photo and go to Paris immediately
Press your aunt for more details about the man
